Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO BUDGET AND REVENUE

Title: Permits deductions for commercial cannabis activity
Summary: Permits deductions for commercial cannabis activity including the cultivation, possession, manufacture, distribution, processing, storing, laboratory testing, packaging, labeling, transportation, delivery, or sale of cannabis and cannabis products, or acting as the holder of an adult-use on-site consumption license.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to permitting deductions for commercial cannabis activity; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
